meta-review.comment: Freedom Planet 2 offers a high-octane platforming experience that successfully captures the spirit of classic Sega games while introducing refreshing gameplay improvements. With its tight controls, diverse playable characters, and intricate level design, this game will satisfy both nostalgia-hungry gamers and platformer enthusiasts. While some critics pointed out minor issues with hitboxes and dialogue, the overall consensus is that Freedom Planet 2 expertly balances retro charm with modern enhancements.
